sentences.english: Then dialin to the modem again.
sentences.chinese: 然后再次拨入调制解调器。
你的调制解调器够快吗？

sentences.english: Select a bonded Bluetooth phone to use as a dialup modem.
sentences.chinese: 请选择绑定的蓝牙电话用作拨号调制解调器。

sentences.english: This paper investigates the shortwave multitone parallel modem.
sentences.chinese: 本文主要研究了短波多音并行调制解调器。

sentences.english: No, the vast majority of people accessed the internet from a 56k modem.
sentences.chinese: 绝大多数人通过56k的调制解调器上网。

sentences.english: It also dials phone numbers using speaker or modem.
sentences.chinese: 也可使用扬声器或者调制解调器的拨电话号码。

sentences.english: Monitor the synchronization between numlock led and modems activity.
sentences.chinese: 监视器同步锁之间的数领导和调制解调器活动。

sentences.english: Compatible modem, ethernet card, sound card or other PCI card.
sentences.chinese: 兼容的调制解调器，以太网卡，声卡或其他PCI卡。

sentences.english: Otherwise you could end up frying your modem and possibly the motherboard too.
sentences.chinese: 否则，你可能落得油炸你的主机板调制解调器和可能。

sentences.english: The modem is being used by another Dial-Up Networking connection or another program.
sentences.chinese: 调制解调器正在被另一个拨号网络或程序使用。

sentences.english: FCC Part 68 -- All Types of Telecommunications Terminal Equipment, i. e. Telephones , modems, etc.
sentences.chinese: 各类电信终端设备，即电话，调制解调器等。

definition: network router/gateway (to Internet or between networks)
